lyrics:
Rise up against the chains that bind,
Our fists raised high, we’ll never find,
A world that’s fair, where all can shine,
In the face of oppression, we’ll align,
With every beat of our hearts, we’ll fight,
For the freedom to live, without a fight,
We’ll break the bars, and shatter the night,
Our rebellion’s cry, echoes through the land,
We’ll never back down, we’ll never stand still,
With our spirit unbroken, we’ll conquer still.
title: Rise Up

lyrics:
In the first love’s thrill, our hearts entwined,
Young romance’s innocence, in the summer’s shine,
Every kiss, a flame that ignites,
In the fire of desire, our love’s design,
In the eyes of our beloved, our souls align,
With each touch, our hearts synchronize,
First love’s magic, in the romantic daze,
In the sweet embrace, our innocence amaze,
Every moment, a memory we create,
In the thrill of young love, our hearts abate,
Romantic echoes, in the summer breeze,
In the first love’s bliss, our spirits release,
With each word, our love’s essence we seize,
In the innocence of young romance, our hearts appease,
In the first love’s thrill, our hearts find ease.
title: First Love's Thrill

lyrics:
Feeling alive, with the wind in my hair,
No worries, no care, just living for today,
Sun-kissed skin, and a heart full of cheer,
Dancing on the beach, without a single fear,
Life is a journey, and I'm here to enjoy the ride.
title: Feeling Alive

lyrics:
In the echo of life, jazz softly plays,
Introspective notes, in the night’s haze,
Questioning existence, in the music’s maze,
With each note, our thoughts blaze,
Life’s melody, in the jazz phase,
In the sound of the sax, our minds graze,
Through the rhythm, the heart weighs,
In the introspection, the spirit appraises,
Jazz’s narrative, through the days,
In the music, life’s essence stays,
Echoes of existence, in the jazz sways,
Each chord, a piece of the life’s essays,
In the introspective night, our gaze,
Jazz’s reflection, in the cosmic plays,
In the sound of life, our existence laze.
title: Echoes in Jazz2

lyrics:
From the streets to the spotlight, the journey’s tale,
Under the city lights, where dreams prevail,
In the beat of the night, we set sail,
Empowering rhythm, as we unveil,
Rise to fame, in the hip-hop grail,
Every verse a step, we never derail,
The legacy we build, will not pale,
In the echoes of the streets, our story’s trail,
With each rhyme, we scale,
In the heart of the city, we hail,
Under the neon lights, we never fail,
Hip-hop’s narrative, we regale,
In the empowerment of sound, we entail,
Legacy in the lyrics, we nail,
From the streets to fame, our journey’s sail.
title: Rhymes of Rise2

lyrics:
In the cyber world, digital streams flow,
Neon lights blink, in the futuristic glow,
Electronic dreams, where the virtual seeds grow,
In the matrix of sound, our consciousness stow,
Futuristic beats, the digital wind blow,
In the neon night, the cybernetic show,
Through the network’s veins, our avatars row,
In the electronic pulse, our dreams bestow,
With each byte, our fantasies tow,
In the digital realm, our thoughts bestow,
Neon dreamscape, the city’s below,
Cyber world’s rhythm, in the techno sow,
In the virtual echo, our spirits bow,
Futuristic journey, in the electronic plow,
In the neon dreams, our minds endow.
title: Neon Dreams2

lyrics:
In the shadows of the past, reminiscence weaves,
Memories in the heart, the mind perceives,
Echoes of the old, the soul grieves,
In the tapestry of time, the past cleaves,
Melancholic threads, the memory retrieves,
In the gallery of thoughts, the mind believes,
Shadows cast long, as the heart deceives,
In the maze of memories, the spirit heaves,
Reminiscing in the silence, the night achieves,
Each thought a whisper, the past bequeaths,
In the melancholy of indie, the mind conceives,
Shadows of the past, the heart weaves,
In the reminiscence, our story never leaves,
In the echoes of time, the soul retrieves.
title: Shadows of Reminiscence2
